name: Baby Murphy
description:
Murphy's law, when the door of the playpen for a child broke, when dangerous objects arouse special interest or when some troubles happen at the most inappropriate moment.

Try to feel it from both sides.

Crossplay Game for 2-3 players. 

Goal for Baby: collect a certain number of "bad toys". Use "boosters" for debuff parent.
Goal for Parent: do not let the child collect "bad toys" in the allotted time. Grab toys, and hide them in hard-to-reach places.

Controls for PC players:
Keyboard: WASD - movement, Mouse or QE - for Rotate, Space - for run.
Gamepad: Left Stick - movement, Right Stick - Rotate, South button for Run.

Controls for VR:
Left Stick - movement, Right Stick - rotate, Grip button for grab items (inclusive Distant grab)
